faqs.question: What is the address of UMT?
faqs.answer: The address of the University of Management and Technology is C-II Johar Town, Lahore, Pakistan.

faqs.question: What is the phone number for UMT?
What is the email address for UMT admissions?
faqs.answer: The email address for UMT admissions is admissions@umt.edu.pk.

faqs.question: What are the email addresses for specific program inquiries at UMT?
faqs.answer: For undergraduate programs, email undergraduate@umt.edu.pk. For graduate programs, email graduate@umt.edu.pk. For general inquiries, use admissions@umt.edu.pk.

faqs.question: When are UMT Fall 2025 admissions open?
faqs.answer: UMT Fall 2025 admissions are open now (as of October 1, 2025). Apply early as seats fill on a first-come, first-served basis, typically until mid-August.

faqs.question: Where can I find the latest updates on Fall 2025 admissions?
faqs.answer: Visit the UMT Admissions Schedule page at https://admissions.umt.edu.pk/Admissions-Schedule.aspx for the latest updates.

faqs.question: What programs are offered for Fall 2025?
faqs.answer: UMT offers over 180 accredited programs, including undergraduate (BS), graduate (MS/MBA), and PhD programs in fields like business, engineering, social sciences, health sciences, and more. Check https://admissions.umt.edu.pk/ for details.

faqs.question: What are the admission criteria for undergraduate programs?
faqs.answer: Undergraduate merit is based on 50% Intermediate marks, 30% UMT Entry Test, 20% Matric marks, and an interview if required. Engineering programs require a minimum 33% in the entry test. LLB requires the Law Admission Test (LAT).

faqs.question: What are the admission criteria for graduate and PhD programs?
faqs.answer: Graduate and PhD merit is based on academic marks, 50% UGAT/GAT/UMT Test scores, and panel interview marks. A relevant bachelor's degree with a minimum 2.5 CGPA is required.

faqs.question: Where can I find entry test samples?
faqs.answer: Entry test samples are available on the UMT Office of Information and Admissions (OIA) website at https://admissions.umt.edu.pk/.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure for UMT programs?
faqs.answer: UMT offers affordable, installment-based fees. Detailed fee structures (tuition, security deposit, etc.) are available at https://admissions.umt.edu.pk/fee.aspx. Examples: BS Business Administration (~PKR 2,090,000 total, 4 years), MS Management (~PKR 790,000 total, 2 years).

faqs.question: What financial aid options are available at UMT?
faqs.answer: UMT offers merit-based (up to 100% tuition waiver for 85%+ marks) and need-based scholarships. Other options include kinship, alumni, and sports scholarships. Apply via the admissions portal at https://admissions.umt.edu.pk/.

faqs.question: How can I apply to UMT for Fall 2025?
faqs.answer: Apply in-person at the UMT campus (C-II Johar Town, Lahore) or online at https://onlineadmissions.umt.edu.pk/. Complete the application, pay the PKR 2,000 processing fee via HBL (Account #2349-70000003-03), and upload required documents.

faqs.question: What documents are required for admission?
faqs.answer: Required documents include Matric/Intermediate transcripts, CNIC, passport photos, and entry test results (if applicable). International applicants need equivalence certificates.

faqs.question: When is the orientation for Fall 2025 at UMT?
faqs.answer: Orientation for Fall 2025 is scheduled from September 29, 2025, to October 4, 2025.

faqs.question: When do classes start for Fall 2025?
faqs.answer: Classes for Fall 2025 start on October 6, 2025 (Monday).

faqs.question: When are the mid-term exams for Fall 2025?
faqs.answer: Mid-term examinations for Fall 2025 are scheduled from December 1, 2025, to December 6, 2025, conducted in class.

faqs.question: When are the final exams for Fall 2025?
faqs.answer: Final examinations for Fall 2025 are scheduled from January 26, 2026, to February 7, 2026.

faqs.question: What is the last date to withdraw from courses in Fall 2025?
faqs.answer: The last date to withdraw from courses in Fall 2025 is November 14, 2025 (Friday).

faqs.question: When are the quarterly fee due dates for 2025-26?
faqs.answer: Quarterly fee due dates are March 5, June 5, September 5, and December 5. Late payments incur a PKR 3,000 fine plus PKR 100 per day for the ILM fund scholarships.

faqs.question: What public holidays will UMT observe in Fall 2025?
faqs.answer: Public holidays in Fall 2025 include Iqbal Day (November 9, 2025) and Quaid-e-Azam Day (December 25, 2025), subject to federal government announcement.

faqs.question: When is Dr Hasan Sohaib Murad Day in 2025?
faqs.answer: Dr Hasan Sohaib Murad Day is on October 22, 2025 (Wednesday).

faqs.question: When is the UMT convocation for Fall 2025?
faqs.answer: The convocation for Fall 2025 is scheduled for November 2025 (exact date to be confirmed).

faqs.question: What is UMTâ€™s ranking?
faqs.answer: UMT is ranked #1 private-sector university in Pakistan and 501-600 globally by Times Higher Education World University Rankings 2023.
